headline.print_headline: Italy Administrator Caught Up in Racism Row
headline.main: Italy Administrator Caught Up in Racism Row

lead_paragraph: Carlo Tavecchio, the favourite to become the next Italian Football Federation (FIGC) president, has been caught up in a racism storm after referring to African players as "banana eaters".    The influx of foreign players has been a hot topic since the national team crashed out of the World Cup in the group stage and 71-year-old Tavecchio suggested Italy should replicate England's stringent requirements for non-EU players.
